Suggestions for swollen 
ankles, feet and fingers
• Avoid standing for long 
periods.
• Wear comfortable shoes.
• Put your feet up as much 
as you can. Try to rest for 
an hour a day with your feet 
higher than your heart.
• Do foot exercises (see 
page 46).
• If the swelling does not 
reduce ask your doctor 
or midwife to check your 
blood pressure.
